name: .M4P File Extension
summary: Learn about .M4P files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Protected .AAC audio file downloaded from the iTunes Music Store; incorporates Apple Computer's "Fairplay" DRM copy protection, which limits the number of computers the file can be played on.

content: In order to play a protected M4P file, you must authorize your computer using Apple iTunes. This is done by entering a username and password for the account that downloaded the file. Up to five computers can be authorized with the same account.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
